title: 7 Sleepwear Brands That You’ll Want To Spend The Night With
text:
I’m at a point in my life that I care about what I sleep in (and on). My sheets need to be soft and durable. My comforter should be breathable. My sleepwear should be comfortable (and not just a band t-shirt).

Stars Above Striped Perfectly Cozy Lounge Jogger Pants, $20 at Target: My favorite piece of sleepwear is one of the softest things I own. After Target announced that they were launching three different lounge brands, I found myself in the store and couldn’t help myself. The Stars Above Striped Perfectly Cozy Lounge Jogger Pants are probably the best apparel purchase I’ve made this year. If you want all-over comfort, get the Perfectly Cozy Lounge Jumpsuit and never put real clothes on again.

Washable Silk Tee Set, $198 at Lunya: Other brands like Lunya, with their smooth silk and beautiful design, take sleepwear seriously (and we reap the benefits). Their washable silk Tee Set is something that could be worn as regular clothing as well, which means you’re basically buying two shirts for the price of one gorgeous, flowy silk tee. Bare and Eclipse are my favorite colors. And honestly, you can’t go wrong with a silk robe or jumpsuit.

LOVE Stories Billy PJ Bottoms, $117 at Shopbop: LOVE Stories is a brand that creates elegant pajamas with an edge. Whether it’s the leopard print Cara Midi Slip or polka-dotted Billy PJ Bottoms, these are pieces you’ll be counting the days to wear again while they’re in the wash.

Marina AtLeisure Shirt in Pine Velvet, $348 at Sleepy Jones: Sleepy Jones mixes masculine and feminine designs to create sleepwear you’ll want to live in 24/7. The Marina AtLeisure Shirt in Pine Velvet is the perfect winter-time pajama while the breezy Silk Marina Pajama Pant is what you’ll want to throw on when the weather starts to warm up. Also, this is one of the best tote bags I’ve seen in a while.

SKIN Jemma Voile-Trimmed Pima Cotton-Jersey Pajamas, $165 at Net-a-Porter: If you want the softness of silk but are more of a cotton person SKIN makes some durable, soft sleepwear that has elevated designs but made from Pima cotton. The Ribbed Jersey Travel Set has all the pieces you could want while away from home and Jemma Voile-Trimmed Pima Cotton-Jersey Pajamas takes inspiration from classic menswear styling.

Sleeper Blur on Coal PJ Set, $320 at ShopBop: Sleeper is an innovative sleepwear brand with the tagline: “World's First Walking Sleepwear.” Their linen maxi dresses took off last year, but they also make some sleek matching sets that you’ll want to lounge in all day.

Silk Tank and Pant Set in Emerald Floral, $198 at Helena Quinn: Helena Quinn makes some incredible floral pajamas that you could easily wear out and about. Pair the Silk Tank and Pant Set in Emerald Floral with a blazer and heels and you’re good to go. Or chuck a coordinating robe on top and you’re halfway to becoming Gillian Anderson’s character in Sex Education.
